posts.post_title: FS - 1874 Harper's Weekly Woodcut - Phil. A's w/ Cap Anson - PRICE REDUCTION
posts.post_content:
Selling:

1874 Harper's Weekly Woodcut of the Philadelphia A's - July 25, 1874 - which includes one of the earliest known images of HOFer Adrian "Cap" Anson as a 21/22 yr-old.  Just look at that baby-face!

Asking $125

Unbelievable piece...you won't be disappointed!  I haven't seen one of these available in quite some time.

Price includes insured shipping + paypal fees, etc. First to e-mail "I'll take it" to [url]h2oya311@yahoo.com[/url] has rights to the card. See my collection (link below) for other cards I'm selling.
bump for price reduction!  Don't hesitate to make me an offer.
